title: dont test for SourceChangeWarning in incompatible environments
body_html:
in certain python environments (where you only ship .pyc files), one cannot retrieve the source code for an nn.Module. However, our tests assume that you can always retrieve the source code and do some checks.
This PR identifies such an environment and skips these checks in those settings.
body_text:
in certain python environments (where you only ship .pyc files), one cannot retrieve the source code for an nn.Module. However, our tests assume that you can always retrieve the source code and do some checks.
This PR identifies such an environment and skips these checks in those settings.
body:
in certain python environments (where you only ship `.pyc` files), one cannot retrieve the source code for an nn.Module. However, our tests assume that you can always retrieve the source code and do some checks.
This PR identifies such an environment and skips these checks in those settings.
